channel.description: Opaque routing identifier used by external delivery mechanisms

signal.description: Payload carried by the message; all semantic meaning resides here

timestamp.description: Unix time in seconds since epoch; may include fractional seconds

valid_message: Must be a valid JSON object
Must not require interpretation of channel value by the sender or receiver

compatibility.forward_compatibility: Additional fields may be added by higher-level specifications or profiles without invalidating core compliance
compatibility.backward_compatibility: Messages conforming to this specification remain valid across future epochs provided required fields are unchanged
